Definitions.Paraphrase:
1. [C] a wild animal 
野兽
A maddened buffalo is the most dangerous of all the beasts. 
发狂的野牛是所有的野兽中最危险的。
2. [C] a cruel person 
粗鲁或残忍的人
He was a real beast to her. 
他对她简直像野兽一样。

[C] a musical instrument with six strings and a long neck which is usually made of wood, and which is played by pulling or beating the strings with the fingers 
吉他
classical/electric guitar 
古典/电吉他
I've been learning how to play the guitar. 
我一直在学弹吉他。

[U] a type of modern music with a strong beat in which the players do not necessarily follow written musical notes for all or part of the piece 
爵士乐
Jazz originated among black musicians in the southern US. 
爵士乐源自美国南部的黑人音乐家。
He plays jazz as a hobby. 
他把演奏爵士乐作为业余爱好。

[C] 
盒式录音带，盒式录像带
a video cassette 
录像带
an audio cassette 
录音带
a cassette player 
放音机，放像机

1. [U] the activity of reading books
阅读，读
I have always loved reading. 
我一直喜欢读书。
He found reading and writing difficult. 
他发现读写都很难。
2. [C] the figure, measurement, temperature, etc. shown on an instrument, etc. 
读数
The reading on the thermometer was 40o. 
温度计的读数是40度。
3. [C] sth. of the stated type to be read 
读物 
The book is a good/dull reading. 
这是本不错的/枯燥的读物。

[C] a particular form in which a book, magazine, or newspaper is published 
版本
I've ordered the paperback / hardback edition of their dictionaries. 
我已订购了他们词典的平装/精装本。
There's going to be a new edition of this book. 
这本书将出新版。

[C] a teacher who works with one student or a small group, either in a university or in the home of a child 
家庭教师，私人教师，辅导教师，导师
His parents employed a tutor for him instead of sending him to school. 
他父母没送他去上学，而是给他请了一位家庭教师。
His tutor encouraged him to read widely. 
他的导师鼓励他广泛阅读。

teach
教授，指导
He tutored the child in mathematics. 
他指导这孩子的数学。
Children are routinely tutored for hours after school. 
放学后孩子们通常再接受几个小时的辅导。

[U] information or statements of opinion about sth., such as a new product, that provide an idea of whether it is successful or liked 
反映，反馈信息
We are waiting for feedback from the students' parents on the new scheme for buying schoolbooks. 
我们正在等待学生家长对购买教材新计划的反馈信息。
The feedback from the customers is very positive. 
从客户那里收到的反馈信息是令人乐观的。

[C] a substance, such as silicon, which allows the passing of an electric current more easily than an insulator but not as well as a conductor
半导体
Semiconductors are used for making integrated circuits and computers. 
半导体用于制造集成电路和计算机。

send or give (sth.) in ways that cannot be seen 
传播，传送
Fibre-optic cables will transmit electronic signals. 
光纤电缆能传送电子信号。
The survivors of the shipwreck transmitted a distress signal every hour. 
失事船只的幸存者每小时发出一次求救信号。

1. [C] a thing that carries sth. 
运送工具，运载工具
Carrier-based planes refer to those that can take off and land on an aircraft carrier. 
舰载机指的是那些可以在航空母舰上起飞和降落的飞机。
2. [C] a person who carries sth. 
搬运东西的人
He'd got a job as a carrier on a building site. 
他在建筑工地找到了一份搬运工的工作。

[C] a narrow beam of concentrated light, used for cutting metals and other hard materials and in medical operations, etc., or an apparatus for producing such beams of light 
激光; 激光器
Lasers are used for cutting hard substances such as metal and for performing delicate surgical operations. 
激光被用来切割金属类的坚硬物质和进行高难度的精细手术。
a laser printer 
激光打印机

that is the reason or explanation; therefore 
因此，所以
A better working environment improves people's performance, and hence productivity. 
好的工作环境能改善人的表现，从而提高生产率。
Microwaves have got cheaper and hence more people can afford them. 
微波炉已降了价，因此更多的人能买得起了。

[C] a pattern, plan or arrangement 
(安排或表现的)样式，方式，计划
I think we need a change of format. 
我认为我们需要改一改形式。
There is no set format for these weekly meetings.
这些每周举行的会议没有固定的模式。
We'll produce the leaflet in large and small formats. 
我们将把传单印成大小两种样式。

connected with sound and the recording and broadcasting of sound 
与音响有关的，播音的，音频的
an audio cassette 
录音盒带
an audio tape 
录音磁带
an audio signal 
音频信号

[C] a measured amount of sth. such as medicine 
（药的一次）用量，剂量
He was not able to sleep without heavy doses of sleeping pills. 
他不服大剂量的安眠药就无法入睡。
The label on the bottle says the dose is three of the pills with every meal. 
瓶子上的标签说，用量是每餐3颗药丸。

1. [C] the cutting part of a knife, etc. 
刀片
a knife blade 
小刀片
This blade needs sharpening. 
这个刀片需要磨一下。
2. [C] a long flat leaf or piece of grass 
草叶
a blade of grass 
一片草叶

[C] a machine that works like a human being 
机器人，自动控制装置
Some types of robots can walk and talk. 
有些种类的机器人可以走路和说话。
Robots are commonly used in factories to assemble machines such as cars. 
机器人通常被用在工厂中装配汽车等机器。

[C] the set of keys on a computer or typewriter that one presses in order to make it work, or the row of keys on a musical instrument such as a piano 
（电脑、打字机或乐器的）键盘
The new model of word processor has a smaller keyboard. 
新型的文字处理机键盘更小。
The pianist sat down at the keyboard and began to play. 
钢琴家坐在钢琴（键盘）前开始演奏。

[C] a person who writes reports for a newspaper, etc. 
记者，通讯员
a war correspondent 
战地记者
our correspondent in Beijing 
本报驻北京记者
the education correspondent for the newspaper 
该报教育新闻记者

1. [C] a lack of sth. 
真空般的状态，空白
His resignation has left a power / political vacuum at the head of the party. 
他辞职后，该党领袖空缺，留下了一个权力/政治真空。
Her death left a vacuum in his life.
她的去世使他的生活变得空虚。
2. [C] a space from which all air has been removed 
真空
Nothing can live in a vacuum. 
任何生命都不能在真空中生存。
Sound waves cannot travel through a vacuum.
声波在真空中无法传播。

clean with a vacuum cleaner 
用真空吸尘器清扫 
She vacuumed the carpet. 
她用吸尘器清扫地毯。

1. artificial 
人造的，合成的
This synthetic dress material does not crush. 
这种合成纤维衣料不会皱。
Synthetic rubber has substituted natural rubber in many fields. 
合成橡胶在许多领域取代了天然橡胶。
2. not sincere or genuine
虚假的 
I hate her synthetic skin-deep smiles. 
我讨厌她那副皮笑肉不笑的样子。

1. the place where a particular person lives or works, including the people he or she knows 
世界，领域，范围
His family is his whole universe. 
他的家庭是他的整个天地。
2. everything that exists, esp. all physical matter, including all the stars, planets, galaxies, etc. in space 
宇宙，天地万象
Is there intelligent life elsewhere in the universe? 
宇宙中其他地方有智慧生命吗？
The big bang theory of the origin of the universe was once very popular. 
关于宇宙起源的大爆炸理论曾风行一时。

very important 
至关重要的，关键的
The next game is crucial — if we lose it, we will lose the match. 
下一场比赛十分关键，如果输了，就输掉了整个比赛。
His evidence proved crucial to the legal case. 
他的证词对这一案件至关重要。
It is crucial that the problem be tackled immediately. 
关键是马上着手处理这个问题。

[C] (pl. -men) a person whose job is to collect and deliver letters, etc. 
邮递员
Has the postman come this morning? 
今天上午邮递员来过没有？

1. [U] letters 
信件，函件
personal correspondence 
私人信函
Any further correspondence should be sent to my new address. 
以后的来信请寄往我的新地址。
He found her letter at the bottom of a piece of business correspondence. 
他在一封商业信函底下找到了她的来信。
2. [U] the action of writing, receiving and reading letters, esp. between two people 
通信，通信联系
He has kept up a correspondence with his teacher since graduation. 
他毕业后一直与他的老师保持着通信联系。
Her correspondence with Jim lasted many years. 
她和吉姆的通信持续了许多年。

[C] a drawing that explains sth. that is difficult to understand 
图解，示意图
The teacher drew a diagram showing how the blood flows through the heart. 
老师画了张示意图，说明血液如何流过心脏。
The book has diagrams showing the parts of a car engine. 
这本书有一些示意图，说明汽车发动机的部件。

[C] (pl. -men) a person who speaks on behalf of a group, organization or government 
发言人 
a government spokesman 
政府发言人
a spokesman for the organization 
该组织发言人

[C] a part or share of sth. larger 
一部分，一份
A large portion of the company's profits goes straight back into new projects. 
公司利润的一大部分又直接投入到新的项目中。
The computer factory represents only a small portion of the company's business. 
计算机工厂只是该公司业务的一小部分。

1. (AmE ensure) make (sth.) certain to happen 
保证，担保 
The airline is taking further steps to insure public safety on its aircraft. 
航空公司正采取进一步的措施以保证其飞机上乘客的安全。
Please insure that lights are switched off before you leave the building. 
请确保你离开大楼时所有的灯都已关掉。
2. arrange insurance for sth. 
给……保险，投保
This silver's very valuable — you should insure it. 
这块银牌非常贵重，你应该给它投保。
All our household goods are insured against accidental damage. 
我家所有的物品都投了意外损失险。

1. [C] computer equipment which allows one to use a central computer 
计算机终端
The data will be fed into a computer terminal. 
这些资料将被输入计算机终端。
2. [C] the area or building at a station, airport or port which is used by passengers leaving or arriving by train, aircraft or ship 
候机楼，码头，出入口
The new air / rail terminal is very large and well-designed. 
新的候机楼/火车站很大，设计得很好。
Your flight to Shanghai will leave from Terminal 4. 
你去上海的航班将在4号航站出发。

[C] a machine with keys for printing letters on a piece of paper 
打字机
an electric typewriter 
电动打字机

[C] a person who is employed in a library 
图书管理员
She asked the librarian to reserve the book for her. 
她请图书管理员为她保留该书。

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
arrange to take part in an activity 
（经报名或签约）获得，从事
Do you know how many students have signed up for the course? 
你知道有多少学生报名修这门课吗？
They have signed up for the battle against AIDS. 
他们已加入到与艾滋病抗争的斗争中。

speaking in a general way; generally speaking 
一般说来
Broadly speaking, they are similar in many respects. 
大致上说，他们在许多方面都很相似。
Broadly speaking, I agree with you. 
大致上我同意你的观点。

be about; mean
指的是，涉及
The star refers to items which are intended for the advanced learner. 
星号指示的是那些适用于高级学习者的条目。
The term "arts" usually refers to humanities and social sciences. 
"文科"这个词通常指人文和社会科学。

be regarded as being like or equal to (sth. or sb.) 
比作
Man's life is often compared to a candle. 
人生常被喻为蜡烛。
The poet compares his lover to a rose in his poems. 
诗人在诗歌中把他的情人比作玫瑰花。

1.produce; supply
1.拿出，提供
She came up with some pictures taken by her father. 
她拿出一些她父亲拍的照片。
2. think of or suggest a plan or idea, a solution to a problem, or an answer to a question 
2.提出，想出
She came up with a new idea for increasing sales. 
她想出一个增加销售的新办法。
He couldn't come up with an appropriate answer just at the time. 
那时他想不出一个合适的答案。

in sb.'s control, care or possession 
在……手上，在……掌握之中
The matter is now in the hands of my lawyer. 
这件事已在我的律师的控制之下。
At that time, the castle was in the hands of their enemy. 
那时城堡还在他们的敌人手里。

be able to reach or use (sth.) 
享有接近（或进入）……的机会，享有使用……的权利
Students must have access to good resources. 
学生必须有机会享用好的资源。
Many divorced fathers only have access to their children at weekends. 
许多离了婚的父亲只在周末获许见他们的孩子。

need (sth. or sb.) in order to survive, be successful, or work correctly 
依靠
She relies on her parents for tuition. 
她的学费依赖于父母。
These days we rely heavily on computers to organize our work. 
现在我们在工作安排方面极为依赖计算机。

fail to develop at the same rate as sth. else, or fail to achieve a standard reached by other people 
落后，落在……后面
He is falling behind all the top players. 
他落后于所有的一流选手。
She soon fell behind other students because of illness. 
因为生病她很快落在了其他同学的后面。

use all of sth. for a particular purpose 
把……专用（于）
He devoted all his time to his job. 
他把他的全部时间都用在工作上了。
This magazine is devoted to science.
这个杂志专门刊载科技文章。
阿尔·戈尔（美国前副总统）
伯克利（美国加利福尼亚州西部城市）
圣莫尼卡（美国加利福尼亚州西南部城市）
